title: 'Breaking Bad' Homeowner Tired Of Pizzas On The Roof
teaser: Walter White's house on Breaking Bad is a real home in Albuquerque, N.M. But it's having a problem that comes straight out of the television series â€” tourists have been throwing pizzas on the roof to replicate a popular scene in the show.
